// begin MANDATORY imports (always generated EXACTLY)
import React from 'react';
import { List, FunctionField, Datagrid, TextField, DateField, NumberField, Show, SimpleShowLayout, TextInput, NumberInput } from 'react-admin';
import { ReferenceField, ReferenceManyField } from 'react-admin';
import { TabbedShowLayout, Tab, SimpleForm, Edit, Create } from 'react-admin';
import { ReferenceInput, SelectInput, Labeled } from 'react-admin'; 
import { EditButton, DeleteButton, CreateButton } from 'react-admin';
import { Grid, Typography, Box, Divider, Button } from '@mui/material';
import { useRecordContext, useRedirect, Filter, Pagination, BooleanField, BooleanInput } from 'react-admin';
import AddIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Add';
// end mandatory imports

const UserFilter = (props) => (
    <Filter {...props}>
        <TextInput label="Search by Name" source="name" alwaysOn />
        <TextInput label="Email" source="email" />
    </Filter>
);

// User List
export const UserList = (props) => (
    <List filters={<UserFilter />} {...props} sort={{ field: 'name', order: 'ASC' }} pagination={<Pagination rowsPerPageOptions={[5, 10, 25]} showFirstLastButtons />}>
        <Datagrid rowClick="show">
            <TextField source="name" label="Name" />
            <TextField source="email" label="Email" />
            <TextField source="cell" label="Cell" />
            <ReferenceField label="Fellowship" source="fellowship_name" reference="Fellowship">
                <TextField source="name" />
            </ReferenceField>
        </Datagrid>
    </List>
);

// User Show
export const UserShow = (props) => (
    <Show {...props}>
        <SimpleShowLayout>
            <Box sx={{ mb: 3 }}>
                <Typography variant="h5" component="h2" sx={{ mb: 2, fontWeight: 'bold' }}>
                    User Information
                </Typography>
                <Grid container spacing={3} sx={{ mb: 2 }}>
                    <Grid item xs={12} sm={6} md={3}>
                        <Box sx={{ p: 1 }}>
                            <Labeled label="Name">
                                <TextField source="name" />
                            </Labeled>
                        </Box>
                    </Grid>
                    <Grid item xs={12} sm={6} md={3}>
                        <Box sx={{ p: 1 }}>
                            <Labeled label="Email">
                                <TextField source="email" />
                            </Labeled>
                        </Box>
                    </Grid>
                    <Grid item xs={12} sm={6} md={3}>
                        <Box sx={{ p: 1 }}>
                            <Labeled label="Cell">
                                <TextField source="cell" />
                            </Labeled>
                        </Box>
                    </Grid>
                </Grid>
                <ReferenceField label="Fellowship" source="fellowship_name" reference="Fellowship">
                    <TextField source="name" />
                </ReferenceField>
                <Divider sx={{ my: 2 }} />
            </Box>
        </SimpleShowLayout>
        <TabbedShowLayout>
            <Tab label="Card Selections">
                <ReferenceManyField reference="CardSelection" target="user_id" addLabel={false} pagination={<Pagination />}>
                    <Datagrid rowClick="show">
                        <TextField source="id" label="Selection ID" />
                        <DateField source="selected_date" label="Selected Date" />
                        <ReferenceField label="Circle Type" source="circle_type" reference="Circle">
                            <TextField source="circle_type" />
                        </ReferenceField>
                        <EditButton />
                        <DeleteButton />
                    </Datagrid>
                </ReferenceManyField>
            </Tab>
            <Tab label="Responses">
                <ReferenceManyField reference="Response" target="user_id" addLabel={false} pagination={<Pagination />}>
                    <Datagrid rowClick="show">
                        <TextField source="id" label="Response ID" />
                        <DateField source="response_date" label="Response Date" />
                        <TextField source="response_text" label="Response Text" />
                        <BooleanField source="response_bool" label="Response Bool" />
                        <NumberField source="response_range" label="Response Range" />
                        <EditButton />
                        <DeleteButton />
                    </Datagrid>
                </ReferenceManyField>
            </Tab>
        </TabbedShowLayout>
    </Show>
);

// User Create
export const UserCreate = (props) => (
    <Create {...props}>
        <SimpleForm>
            <Box sx={{ mb: 3 }}>
                <Typography variant="h5" component="h2" sx={{ mb: 2, fontWeight: 'bold' }}>
                    Create New User
                </Typography>
                <Grid container spacing={3} sx={{ mb: 2 }}>
                    <Grid item xs={12} sm={6} md={4}>
                        <Box sx={{ p: 1 }}>
                            <TextInput source="name" label="Name" fullWidth validate={required()} />
                        </Box>
                    </Grid>
                    <Grid item xs={12} sm={6} md={4}>
                        <Box sx={{ p: 1 }}>
                            <TextInput source="email" label="Email" fullWidth />
                        </Box>
                    </Grid>
                    <Grid item xs={12} sm={6} md={4}>
                        <Box sx={{ p: 1 }}>
                            <ReferenceInput source="fellowship_name" reference="Fellowship">
                                <SelectInput optionText="name" validate={required()} />
                            </ReferenceInput>
                        </Box>
                    </Grid>
                </Grid>
            </Box>
        </SimpleForm>
    </Create>
);

// User Edit
export const UserEdit = (props) => (
    <Edit {...props} redirect={false}>
        <SimpleForm>
            <Box sx={{ mb: 3 }}>
                <Typography variant="h5" component="h2" sx={{ mb: 2, fontWeight: 'bold' }}>
                    Edit User
                </Typography>
                <Grid container spacing={3} sx={{ mb: 2 }}>
                    <Grid item xs={12} sm={6} md={4}>
                        <Box sx={{ p: 1 }}>
                            <TextInput source="name" label="Name" fullWidth validate={required()} />
                        </Box>
                    </Grid>
                    <Grid item xs={12} sm={6} md={4}>
                        <Box sx={{ p: 1 }}>
                            <TextInput source="email" label="Email" fullWidth />
                        </Box>
                    </Grid>
                    <Grid item xs={12} sm={6} md={4}>
                        <Box sx={{ p: 1 }}>
                            <ReferenceInput source="fellowship_name" reference="Fellowship">
                                <SelectInput optionText="name" validate={required()} />
                            </ReferenceInput>
                        </Box>
                    </Grid>
                </Grid>
            </Box>
        </SimpleForm>
    </Edit>
);

export default {
    list: UserList,
    show: UserShow,
    create: UserCreate,
    edit: UserEdit,
};
